review: Great service provided from the staff, The Dr's recommendation were right on the mark, Thank you.

I am santhosh. I so excited  in writing a feedback  about the dr supraja chandrushekar. Initially  my son age 3 years old had fever  we have take him to  clinic at tumkur the famous dr ( don't want to use his name)has diagnosed this is a viral fever. Without checking  blood and xray no need worry i ll make him normal... but he cant able to reduce the fever. 23rd of August  2022 late night we came know after a xray right lung got collapsed  due to heavy fever... me n my wife worried  a lot don't  know what do.... saturation  is came down to 90... me and my friends  decided  to take him to bangalore but we dont no which hospitals are good at this problem we randomly  visited  to manipal hospital (colambia Asia hospital) yashwanthpur branch at mid night.... after reaching  the hospital  really  they guided us what has to done to a kid started the treatment  and diagnosed what has to done...  dr supraj madam has reached  hospital  by seeing  c t report and xray report morning 6am... she guided us what has to be done...we both were crying dont no what do nobody  is with us at that time... your son need to go under surgery to remove the pus ...she is explained  how surgery happens... we have no other options  without trusting  you u people.. do whatever  i need my son to normal.. after surgery  we spend 18 days in the hospital dr supraja  and dr gurudath n dr saiprasad.... am really that these doctors... am really  thankful to u peaple for son normal.... once again thank u.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had visited for my 8 month old baby when he had fever, cold and cough. keeping covid situation in mind, we were at very delicate situation. Doctor was really friendly and her explanation was very detail. she was calm and composed. thoroughly examined baby and gave us confidence. **** ************ * **** ****

The only problem is inspite of taking appointment , we are made to wait for more than 1.5 hrs.
The waiting time is very impractical just for consultation. 
Practo gauranties less waiting time, which is not true.
Something needs to be done with reference to waiting time, so that every patient should not wait for more than half an hour. In case the dr is busy with an emergency then all the opd patients should be communicated atleast by an sms so that they can plan accordingly.
Kindly Value everyone's time
I really like the way the doctor explained the things in detail & also on the healthy diet. She was polite & friendly.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Supraja is an awesome paediatrician. She clearly explained the diagnosis result and treatment. Her solutions are practical and result oriented.Thank you doctor....
She is very good in explanation towards vaccination and all. No force for things which we didn't wanted have. Very nice and friendly nature while consultation.

review:
Thanks to you and your team.
My baby situation was serious when we admitted on first day. Take care of baby is amazing even more than me and my wife on that day. Past 5 years we know you and your team BCS two times we were admitted. 2016 onwards the caring is same and now also. So no different between earlier and now.
Really happy of your treatment, explanations and caring etc. Last day was really happy when we move to home with my baby.
 Thanks to you and your team.
